name: AUTH_REQ_HX_NOTIF_OVRIDE
description: This table contains overrides to authorization request notification milestones. The values in this table override system computer values for turnaround time.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the authorization request record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: COMM_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description: The communication purpose category ID of the notification override.

columns.name: NOTIF_RECPNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The recipient type category ID of the notification override.

columns.name: NOTIF_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The notification method category ID of the notification override.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) of the notification override.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the notification override.
